channel.title: UID Question
channel.description:
Hello nasty moparscapians.
Thanks to Ill pk ur ass, i know now how to get UID of MoparScape Client but, how do we get the UID of our own client cause our clients dont have that Menu under the gamescreen.
Thank you for your time.
~peentbahlwanhandrudneindienyn.

item.title: UID Question
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

You can use it to make you can only connect to a server with that client.
a Client has a UID. you put the Client UID in the server login packet.
It makes you can only connect to a server with the client uid thats entered into
the server login packets or w/e lmao

Read full topic

item.description:

Why is it useful ?
